audioArray.text: Once upon a time, in a lush and vibrant meadow, there lived a tiny seed named Sam
Sam was nestled snugly in the rich soil, surrounded by tall grass and colorful flowers
Sam dreamed of adventure beyond the confines of the meadow, but as a seed, it seemed impossible
One sunny morning, a gentle breeze whispered through the meadow, carrying Sam's wish to the wise old oak tree nearby
The oak tree chuckled softly and rustled its leaves in amusement
"Ah, little seed," the oak tree said, "Adventure is not just for the brave and bold
It's for those who dare to dream
